abstract: Civil rights advocate Marq Lewis criticizes video released by Tulsa County, Okla, sheriff's office showing undercover officer buying drugs from Eric Harris, who was fatally shot by volunteer deputy Robert Bates; Lewis calls video a form of character assassination that has no bearing on how he died.
lead_paragraph: The Tulsa County sheriff’s office released clips Tuesday that it says show a man selling drugs and talking about selling a gun.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Rights Group Calls Video Release ‘Character Assassination’

snippet: The Tulsa County sheriff’s office released clips Tuesday that it says show a man selling drugs and talking about selling a gun.
